SELECT m.PRD_CD ,m.PRD_NM ,i.IVCO_QTY ,m.PRD_CSMR_UPR FROM sd_ivco01_mt i LEFT OUTER JOIN ma_prd01_mt m ON m.PRD_CD=i.prd_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN ma_prt_mt p ON p.prt_cd=i.prt_cd WHERE m.PRD_TP_CD='10' AND (i.prt_cd LIKE '%' || #{prt_keyword} || '%' OR p.prt_nm LIKE '%' || #{prt_keyword} || '%')
AND (i.prd_cd LIKE '%' || #{prd_keyword} || '%' OR m.prd_nm LIKE '%' || #{prd_keyword} || '%')

SELECT s.SAL_DT ,s.CUST_NO ,c.CUST_NM ,s.PRT_CD ,s.SAL_TP_CD ,s.SAL_NO ,s.TOT_SAL_QTY ,s.TOT_SAL_AMT ,s.CSH_STLM_AMT ,s.CRD_STLM_AMT ,s.PNT_STLM_AMT ,s.FST_USER_ID ,TO_CHAR(s.FST_REG_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd') AS sFst_reg_dt FROM CS_SAL01_MT s LEFT OUTER JOIN CS_CUST01_MT c ON s.cust_no=c.cust_no WHERE s.PRT_CD=#{prt_cd} AND s.SAL_DT BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to}
AND s.CUST_NO=#{cust_no}

SELECT d.PRD_CD ,p.PRD_NM ,d.SAL_QTY ,d.SAL_AMT ,d.SAL_SEQ ,d.sal_dt ,d.sal_no FROM CS_SAL01_DT d LEFT OUTER JOIN MA_PRD01_MT p ON d.prd_cd=p.prd_cd WHERE d.PRT_CD=#{prt_cd} and d.sal_dt=#{sal_dt} and d.sal_no=#{sal_no}
